findings.title: Single-File Application Architecture
findings.description: Entire application implemented in a single Go file (111 lines), which is appropriate for this focused use case but may limit maintainability as features grow
findings.impact: Low impact for current scope, may complicate future feature additions
findings.remediation: Consider modular structure if functionality expands beyond current scope

findings.title: Channel-Based Concurrency Pattern
findings.description: Excellent use of Go channels for thread-safe counter management and request-response patterns
findings.impact: Positive architectural decision enabling safe concurrent access
findings.remediation: Continue this pattern for any additional concurrent components

findings.title: Hard-Coded Configuration Constants
findings.description: GPIO pin, network host, and port are hard-coded constants requiring source code modification for changes
findings.impact: Deployment flexibility limited, requires recompilation for environment changes
findings.remediation: Implement environment variable or configuration file support for runtime configuration

findings.title: Missing Graceful Shutdown Handling
findings.description: No signal handling for graceful shutdown, may leave GPIO resources in undefined state
findings.impact: Potential resource leaks and ungraceful termination in production environments
findings.remediation: Add signal handling (SIGTERM, SIGINT) with proper GPIO cleanup and connection closure

findings.title: Error Handling with os.Exit()
findings.description: Network errors cause immediate application termination with os.Exit(1), preventing recovery
findings.impact: Application becomes fragile to temporary network issues
findings.remediation: Implement retry logic and error recovery instead of immediate termination

findings.title: Pre-Modules Dependency Management
findings.description: Project uses pre-Go modules dependency management (no go.mod/go.sum files)
findings.impact: May complicate dependency version management and reproducible builds
findings.remediation: Migrate to Go modules with 'go mod init' and 'go mod tidy'

findings.title: Cross-Compilation Build System
findings.description: Well-designed Makefile with proper cross-compilation for Raspberry Pi ARM6 target
findings.impact: Positive: enables proper embedded systems deployment
findings.remediation: Consider adding additional build targets or CI/CD integration

findings.title: Minimal Security Implementation
findings.description: TCP server has no authentication, encryption, or access controls, exposing counter data to network
findings.impact: Potential unauthorized access to power consumption data
findings.remediation: Implement authentication, consider HTTPS/TLS, or restrict to localhost/private networks
